input.sentences: we headed out to the road to see the parade .
then it seemed that everyone else felt the same .
bagpipe players came first leading the parades music .
vehicles came by carrying various characters .
in the back where the ones marching for causes and such . a standard parade .
output.sentences: Everyone in our small town comes out for the parade.
There is the local marching band that everyone loves to hear play music.
There is even a dog in the parade!
People in trucks drive in the parade and throw candy out.
Dancers march in the parade and perform as well.
